thread.title: Further tributes for Michael Meacher
thread.title_full: Further tributes for Michael Meacher | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Further tributes for Michael Meacher
text:
John McDonnell @johnmcdonnellMP Follow Sad loss of Michael Meacher.We will all miss him.He dedicated his life to Labour.Years ahead of his time he put climate change on our agenda
13:56 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Simon Danczuk @SimonDanczuk Follow Very sad to hear that my colleague Michael Meacher has passed away. My thoughts are with his family and friends at this time
14:11 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Tony Lloyd - GMPCC @GMPCC Follow Tony pays tribute to Michael Meacher MP: "Oldham has lost a great MP & Greater Manchester a great politician." https://t.co/miIl1VQSMU
15:13 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Caroline Lucas @CarolineLucas Follow So sad to hear of death of Michael Meacher. He was great politician, championing climate action. A really good person, he'll be much missed
14:02 - 21 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Wed 21 Oct 2015 Read more 6 updates Michael Meacher, veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton, dies aged 75 Politics Greater Manchester Michael Meacher
